## <u>**_Webinar Series: Efficient Conversion Probability Estimator for Display Advertising_**</u>
<p style="font-size:15px">Updated on 2021-01-28</p>

[Dr. Abdollah Safari](https://pharmsci.ubc.ca/directory/abdollah-safari#:~:text=Abdollah%20is%20a%20statistician%20at,in%20every%20application%20of%20statistics.&text=Safari%20received%20his%20PhD%20in,analysis%20on%20Big%20Data%20problems.) from faculty of Pharmaceutical Sciences, University of British Colombia will speak on methods to estimate the conversion probability of an advertisement to quantify the value of an ad. For registration please visit [here](https://www.eventbrite.ie/e/138800214177).

## <u>**_Webinar Series: Introductory data science, a fresh look_**</u>
<p style="font-size:15px">Updated on 2021-01-28</p>

## <u>**_Webinar Series: Clustering Big Data with Mixed Features_**</u>
<p style="font-size:15px">Updated on 2020-12-02</p>

Joshua Tobin from the School of Computer Science & Statistics, Trinity College Dublin, will introduce a new clustering method for large mixed attribute datasets which adapts and extends the popular peak-finding technique. The algorithm presented is competent at deciding the correct number of clusters and executes with subquadratic complexity. For more information about this webinar please click [here](/webinars/posts/2020-12-10-webinar2/). 

For registration please click [here](https://www.eventbrite.ie/e/y-isa-webinar-series-clustering-big-data-with-mixed-features-tickets-131319198257).

## <u>**_Webinar Series: Global Short-Term Forecasting of Covid-19 Cases_**</u>
<p style="font-size:15px">Updated on 2020-10-29</p>

[Dr. Thiago de Paula Oliveira](https://prof-thiagooliveira.netlify.com/) from the Roslin Institute, University of Edinburgh will speak on a new modelling framework of COVID-19 to forecast the number of cases, study the effects of covariates (such as lockdown policies), and generate forecasts for smaller regions within countries and up to six days ahead. For more information about this webinar please click [here](/webinars/posts/2020-11-12-webinar1/). 

For registration please click [here](https://www.eventbrite.ie/e/y-isa-webinar-series-global-short-term-forecasting-of-covid-19-cases-tickets-127039764355).

## <u>**_Inaugural Young-ISA Meeting_**</u>
<p style="font-size:15px">Updated on 2019-09-01</p>
This inaugural event will gather together early career statisticians from across Ireland for a series of talks on career development in academia and industry. Keynote talks will be given by established professionals in both fields with the remainder of the two sessions devoted to showcasing some of the research projects conducted in universities across Ireland by postgraduate and post-doctoral researchers.

**Invited Speakers:**<br>
Dr. Norma Bargary, Lecturer in Statistics, University of Limerick. <br>
Dr. Aidan Boland, Senior Data Scientist, Edge by Ascential. <br>

The event is **free of charge** to attend and is open to all early career statisticians (including postgraduate and PhD students, postdoctoral researchers and lecturers) and all ISA members. 

Read more [here](/events/2019-09-01-inaugural-meeting/).
